name: Tarlis World
description:
• Game contains 7 campaign maps with many quests around
  • You can choose up to two classes from up to 12 max character slots
  • Each class have to choose up from 6 skills
  • Try again after beating campaign by choosing higher difficulty
  • Game has 4 elements to get your wanted one! (Fire, Cold, Knockback, Lifedrain)
  • Necromancer has ability to summon your undead ones to fight for you!
  • Teleport to base using portal skill anytime to get your gear up/sell
  • Collect and unlock achievements during play
